title: Action Music Mega Bundle - Volume 1
description: Elevate your projects to epic proportions with this offer. Get access to a massive collection of high-quality, royalty-free action music, meticulously crafted to ignite the thrill of the chase, the intensity of battle, and the exhilaration of victory.
longDescription:
Supercharge your action games and content with the Action Music Mega Bundle: Volume 1!


Elevate your projects to epic proportions with this incredible offer. Get instant access to a massive collection of high-quality, royalty-free action music, meticulously crafted to ignite the thrill of the chase, the intensity of battle, and the exhilaration of victory.


Here's what you get:


  • 5 Complete Action Music Bundles: Unleash the power of Action Music Bundle - Volume 1, Volume 2, Volume 3, Volume 4 and Volume 5 each packed with heart-pounding tracks.
  • 20 Individual Music Albums: Dive into a library of over 20 diverse music albums, offering a vast spectrum of moods and styles to perfectly match your action-oriented needs.
  • Over 100 tracks: Craft the perfect soundtrack with hundreds of adrenaline-pumping compositions, from classic orchestral arrangements to hybrid tracks featuring massive choirs and electronic elements.
  • Seamless Looping: Ensure uninterrupted action with seamless loop versions for most of the albums, allowing for effortless integration into your projects.
  • Royalty-Free License: Use this music freely across your games, videos, and other content creations without any usage limitations.


Unbeatable Value:


  • Massive Savings: This mega bundle delivers a whopping $199.99 discount compared to purchasing each album individually at $19.99. You pay only $199.99 for a treasure trove of action-packed music!


Don't miss this opportunity to take your action projects to the next level! Get the Action Music Mega Bundle: Volume 1 today and ignite the soundtrack to your success!


--

technicalDetails:

Do Sound FX loop: (Yes - Partial)

Number of tracks: 164 + Looped Variants

Number of cues: 274

Minutes of audio provided: 384 Minutes (6 Hours & 40 Minutes)

Supported Development Platforms:

Windows: (Yes)
